channel.title: Arcadia - RSPS
channel.description:
[center] [b]Introduction[/b] First of all, welcome to our advertisement topic! We hope this topic will be good enough for you to come and test our amazing server itself. Arcadia is a very nice server with a great staff, we got also a good community and a 24/7 vps hosted server.
[b]Features[/b] - Great Economy - All skills are working - Much Shops (More Comming) - Great Interfaces - VoteShop - Client and Webclient avaible - Great Community - Awesome staff [b]+ MUCH AND MUCH MORE.[/b]
[b]Monsters/Bosses[/b] - Rockcrabs - Corperal Beast - Nex - Tormented Deamons - Daggonoths - Glacors - Jadinko's - Frost Dragons - Knights - Revenants - Slayer Tower - And all the Dungeons.
[b]Shops[/b] - General Store - Weapon Store - Voting Shop - Dung Rewards - Summoning Shops - Armour Shop - Magic Supplies - Ranging Supplies - Supply Shop - Skiller Shop - Slayer Shop - Outfit Shop - SkillCape Shop - Donator Shop
[b]How to play?[/b] You can only play if you register.
[b]Go to our website:[/b] [url=http://arcadia-rsps.com]http://arcadia-rsps.com[/url]
Thread Made By [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/25fsz6p.gif[/img][b]Mozilla[/b]
[/center]

item.title: Arcadia - RSPS
item.dc:creator: @frozenearth frozenearth
item.description:
@frozenearth wrote:

[center]
Introduction
First of all, welcome to our advertisement topic! We hope this topic will be good enough for you to come and test our amazing server itself. Arcadia is a very nice server with a great staff, we got also a good community and a 24/7 vps hosted server.

Features

  • Great Economy
  • All skills are working
  • Much Shops (More Comming)
  • Great Interfaces
  • VoteShop
  • Client and Webclient avaible
  • Great Community
  • Awesome staff
    + MUCH AND MUCH MORE.

Monsters/Bosses

  • Rockcrabs
  • Corperal Beast
  • Nex
  • Tormented Deamons
  • Daggonoths
  • Glacors
  • Jadinko’s
  • Frost Dragons
  • Knights
  • Revenants
  • Slayer Tower
  • And all the Dungeons.

Shops

  • General Store
  • Weapon Store
  • Voting Shop
  • Dung Rewards
  • Summoning Shops
  • Armour Shop
  • Magic Supplies
  • Ranging Supplies
  • Supply Shop
  • Skiller Shop
  • Slayer Shop
  • Outfit Shop
  • SkillCape Shop
  • Donator Shop

How to play?
You can only play if you register.

Go to our website: http://arcadia-rsps.com

Thread Made By Mozilla

[/center]
